param.name: pic
param.para: [in] A pointer of interface. This is a context object in which the update happened.

param.name: ecReadOnly
param.para: [in] A read only edit cookie to access the pic. Using this edit cookie, the application can get the text that is contained in the context object.

param.name: pResultRange
param.para: [in] A pointer of the interface. This is the range of the result string (determined string).

param.name: pCompositionRange
param.para: [in] A pointer of the interface. This is the range of the current composition string.

param.name: pfDeleteResultRange
param.para: [out] A pointer to return the bool value. If it is true, TSF manager deletes the result range so only the current composition range remains in the transitory extension.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: The ITfTransitoryExtensionSink interface is implemented by the application that uses Transitory Extension dim. The application can track the changes that happened in the transitory extension by using this sink interface.
